data.comment: The match is underway in Mexico City.
The match at Estadio Azteca has been interrupted briefly for a check on Gustavo Cabral, who is down injured.
In the minute 5, Cruz Azul have been awarded a corner by Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez.
Jorge Hernandez (Pachuca) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Paulo Pezzolano (Pachuca) is making a first substitution, with Victor Guzman replacing Jorge Hernandez.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Cruz Azul.
Elias Hernandez is booked for the home team.
Cruz Azul to take a throw-in in Pachuca territory.
In the minute 45, Adonai Escobedo Gonzalez blows to end the first-half.
Jonathan Rodriguez scores to make it 1-0 at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 68, Pachuca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
